sentence.text: Here we show that metabolic reprogramming of colorectal cancer is caused chiefly by aberrant negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Knockdown of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in colorectal cancer cells reset the altered metabolism and suppressed cell growth.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Moreover, inhibition of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II target pyrimidine synthesis genes such as apoptotic DNA fragmentation, UMPS, and CTPS blocked cell growth, and thus are potential targets for colorectal cancer therapy

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
